item.description:
Make 200 calls this Saturday. The amount of folks being reached so far is very good.

Go to http://grassroots.wildfireplatform.com ; The website for Grassroots for Liberty Ron Paul 2012 website, (not to be confused with the official campaign for Ron Paul 2012 website).

 

NEW DETAILS:

 

Let Freedom Ring Phone Bomb - July 30th - Tomorrow! We will try to make 100,000 calls in one day!!

Please help WIN the most important event of the election, the Ames Straw Poll on August 13th... help us obtain 2,000 extra Iowan Ron Paul supporters to the Ames Straw Poll.... we already have over 300 commitments so far and we need your help making calls to get to 2,000!!!

Please Spread the Word! Please post the following video everywhere you can:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pJmP3JBkk3g&feature=player_detailpage

Meetup.com
1) Forward this message to your meetup group and share the video link above

Facebook
2) Share the video link above with each of your facebook friends one by one, post the video on your wall. 
Update your profile pic with the 250x300 banner at this link:  http://www.uphill.ro/clients/ronpaul/phonebomb/

Twitter
3) Share the above video on twitter.  (Also tweet how many calls you make to #rp2012org!)

IM
4) Message the video link above and ask people to spread the video to Ron Paul supporters on IM

Call
5) Call your fellow Ron Paul supporters and ask them to participate!

Liberty Websites
6) If you have a website please share the video link above.  Please also put up any of these banners:
http://www.uphill.ro/clients/ronpaul/phonebomb/

Schedule for July 30th - Make 50 calls and Be Trained to be a Closer If you make 50 calls, we'll train you to make follow-up calls on ID'd Iowan Ron Paul supporters. (Our robopoll efforts are going well.)  We have a more limited number of these calls so we need people who have experience and training.  Once you are trained we will set you up to make follow-up calls.  You will feel great when you are getting so many commitments!!!!

Training schedule (all times Eastern):
10am / noon / 2pm / 4pm/ 6pm /8pm

Conference Dial-in Number: (641) 715-3200 begin_of_the_skype_highlighting                 (641) 715-3200         end_of_the_skype_highlighting
 Participant Access Code: 1048840#

If you have a phone bank set up please give me a call: 415-748-1113 begin_of_the_skype_highlighting                 415-748-1113         end_of_the_skype_highlighting

We have 121 Pledges for 20,400 Dials for July 30th!!  Please follow through on your pledge!

Find your name on the pledge list:
http://www.rp2012.org/calls_data.html
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Contact: 415-748-1113 begin_of_the_skype_highlighting                 415-748-1113         end_of_the_skype_highlighting

Remember to share this video!!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pJmP3JBkk3g&feature=player_detailpage

Ron Paul 2012 - Grassroots for Liberty
Please make calls and donate at:
www.rp2012.org

Like us on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/pages/RP2012org/244175648942554

Follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/#!/ rp2012org

Subscribe to our Youtube channel:
http://www.youtube.com/user/ rp2012org

Stay connected:
Help win Ames and the election!
Text AMES to (515) 212-2855 begin_of_the_skype_highlighting                 (515) 212-2855         end_of_the_skype_highlighting Msg & Data rates apply
item.name: LET FREEDOM RING - July 30th - Grassroots Phone Bomb
